javax.activity
Interface PropertyGroup

public interface PropertyGroup

A PropertyGroup is used to provide distributed context, scoped to an Activity, that may be set by an application or a UOW service built on top of the Activity service. The format of the distributed context is specific to the PropertyGroup implementation and is neither examined nor understood by the Activity service. The semantics of the behavioural relationship between PropertyGroups in nested Activities is defined by the specification of each type of PropertyGroup and not by the Activity service.
Any number of named PropertyGroup types may be registered with the Activity service. When an Activity is started, an instance of each type of PropertyGroup used by the Activity is created and associated with the Activity. The types of PropertyGroup used by an Activity may be specified through the ServiceManager object registered for a particular UOW service.
